q: SAN FRANCISCO( Reuters)- Chrysler Group LLC's chief executive apologized on Saturday for describing the high-interest bailout loans extended by the U.S. and Canadian governments in 2009 as ''shyster loans.'' Yesterday, in responding to a question about Chrysler's government loans, I used a term in reference to the interest rate being charged on our government loans that has raised concern, CEO Sergio Marchionne said in a statement. ''I regret the remark which I consider inappropriate.'' Shyster is a derogatory term used to describe an unprincipled lawyer or politician. He used the term at least

Eric Schmidt drew fire for responding to a hypothetical question posed at a forum in Washington, DC, about an implant that would let Google Inc. know what its users were thinking. He responded that Google Inc. 's policy is to get right up to the creepy line and not cross it, and an implant would cross the line. He also said that as users voluntarily share information online, it doesn't need users to type in search queries for the company to tailor the results.

As two of the NBA's most exciting young stars, they are dazzling spectators and TV viewers with limitless creativity and breathtaking moves in the Toronto Raptors-Philadelphia 76ers playoff series. This matchup is great, and people are getting turned on to it, said NBA deputy commissioner Russ Granik , who was at Philadelphia's First Union Center on Wednesday night, when Allen Iverson scored 54 points to Vince Carter 's 28 in the 76ers' 97-92 victory. been.'' The first half, though, was what George Karl wants to see. Allen Iverson , who finished with 31 points and 10 assists, was racing down the court, and his teammates were keeping up. A lot of times Coach talks about me beating guys down the court, and when I had the ball tonight, that wasn't the case, Allen Iverson said. ''They were beating me down the court, and I was just finding guys. They did a great job of finishing.'' Mr Andy Coulson said it had been a ''privilege and an honour'' to work for the Tony Blair for three-and-a-half years. he added: Unfortunately, continued coverage of events connected to my old job at the News of the World has made it difficult for me to give the 110 per cent needed in this role. 16 Jan 2011 The Metropolitan Police recently reopened its criminal investigation into phone hacking at the newspaper after News International suspended a senior news executive. We thank our current directors for their outstanding service to HP and welcome the opportunity to work with our new members. HP's revelation came the same day that another technology heavyweight, Google Inc. , disclosed a surprise reshuffling of its own: CEO Eric Schmidt is relinquishing the job to Google Inc. co-founder Larry Ellison Page.
